messages.subject: YES!  thank you
messages.msgSnippet: Yes, I do believe this is the song!  Wherever did you find this?  Did you just do a search?  Was there sheet music, because I can t quite remember the tune. Oh
messages.messageBody:
Yes, I do believe this is the song! Wherever did you find this? Did you just do a search? Was there sheet music, because I can't quite remember the tune.

Oh my, Dana will be so thrilled - what a song for a kid to love - perhaps it was the presentation.

Thank you again!
Off to search engines,
Karen Mowery

>>>Is this what you're looking for?

Peel Me A Grape

Peel me a grape, crush me some ice
Skin me a peach, save the fuzz for my pillow
Talk to me nice, talk to me nice
You've got to wine and dine me

Don't try to fool me bejewel me
Either amuse me or lose me
I'm getting hungry, peel me a grape

Pop me a cork, french me a fry
Crack me a nut, bring a bowl full of bon-bons
Chill me some wine, keep standing by
Just entertain me, champagne me
Show me you love me, kid glove me
Best way to cheer me, cashmere me
I'm getting hungry, peel me grape

Here's how to be an agreeable chap
Love me and leave me in luxury's lap
Hop when I holler, skip when I snap
When I say, "do it," jump to it

Send out for scotch, call me a cab
Cut me a rose, make my tea with the petals
Just hang around, pick up the tab
Never out think me, just mink me
Polar bear rug me, don't bug me
New Thunderbird me, you heard me
I'm getting hungry, peel me a grape

Cheryl<<<


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
